title: "Register"

Registration is mandatory for the workshop. Additionally we will limit the workshop to a maximum of **10 participants**. In order to ensure that we provide the appropriate guidance for you we request that you submit the following details. After these details are reviewed we will then inform you about the payment details for the registration. Please note that your registration will be confirmed only after the payment is received. Invitations for registration will be sent to your email address from the conference secretariat so please ensure that our official email <RecodeR@tmckolkata.org> is in your contact book. Please send a mail to us this email address if you have questions and will answer the same.

::: callout-caution
Please [**do not**]{.underline} pay the registration fee until we send you the payment link for the same.
:::
